questions.question: Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an island in the Grand Line, where they battle against the Warlord of the Sea, Crocodile. What is...?
This arc takes place on a floating island and involves the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a despotic ruler with the power of light. What is...?
This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, introduced in the Dressrosa arc, possesses the power of the Hobby-Hobby Fruit and can turn people into toys. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
